thread.title: Christopher (Chris) Simpson
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Christopher (Chris) Simpson

author: Christopher (Chris) Simpson
title: Christopher (Chris) Simpson
text:
Solar Quote: s and Finn are simply exceptional!
Within minutes, I had been contacted by three solar providers. All three were extremely informative and competitive with pricing and gave me the opportunity to compare "apples with apples". While in contact with these I was also in contact with a less reputably service provider. (It became apparent why this provider was being investigated by ASIC!)
There is simply no better way to approach this.
Sincere thanks!
